item.title: An Itch That Just Has to Be Scratched‚Ä¶ (Or, Why Am I Joining Decodable?)
item.description: This week I joined Decodable. I’m grateful to my former colleagues at Treeverse for allowing me to join them on the journey with lakeFS - but something about the streaming world was too strong to resist üòÅ.

item.title: What Does This DevEx Engineer Do?
item.description: This was originally titled more broadly “What Does A DevEx Engineer Do”, but that made it into a far too tedious and long-winding etymological exploration of the discipline. Instead, I’m going to tell you what this particular instantiation of the entity does üòÑ
